LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays a list of records from any Salesforce object with customizable fields and styling.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API name of the Salesforce object to display (e.g., Account, Contact, Custom_Object__c)

property.name: listViewFields
property.label: List View Fields
property.description: Comma-separated list of field API names to display as columns (e.g., Phone,Industry,CreatedDate). Note: Id and Name fields are automatically included; you don't need to specify them.

property.name: titleField
property.label: Title Field
property.description: Field to use as the title in record detail view. Name is used by default if left blank. Do not specify if Name is already in List View Fields.

property.name: subtitleField
property.label: Subtitle Field
property.description: Field to use as the subtitle in record detail view. Use a field that is not already in List View Fields to avoid errors.

property.name: maxNavigationDepth
property.label: Max Navigation Depth
property.description: Maximum number of lookup record navigations allowed. Set to 0 to disable all lookup navigation. Set to 1-10 to allow that specific number of related record navigations.

property.name: showNewButton
property.label: Show New Button
property.description: If true, displays a 'New' button on the main list view to create new records.

property.name: recordActionApiNames
property.label: Record Action API Names
property.description: Comma-separated list of Quick Action API Names to show in the record detail modal. Supports standard actions (Edit, Delete, Clone) and custom Flow actions. Example: 'Edit,Delete,Clone,My_Custom_Flow,Send_Email_Flow'. Leave blank to hide all actions.

property.name: recordTypeId
property.label: Record Type ID
property.description: Optional Record Type ID for page layout configuration

property.name: relatedListFields
property.label: Related List Fields Configuration
property.description: JSON configuration for related list fields. Example: {"Contacts":["Name","Email","Phone"]}
